snakesandladders

Class SnakesAndLadders

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • snakesandladders.SnakesAndLadders

  • public class SnakesAndLadders
extends javafx.application.Application
    This is the class which brings the game together and renders it on the screen. This class inherits from Application All attributes in this class do not have any inherent use as such in Object-Oriented terms. The are all Nodes which have to be accessed by the event-handlers inside start method of the class.
    Author:
    Shantanu
